title: What are the four possible outcomes of tonight's Brexit vote?
text:
There are now four possible outcomes stemming from tonight's votes. This is how it could play out

1. A win-win situation for the Government

​MPs vote for the Withdrawal Agreement Bill and also for the Programme Motion (the timetable for rushing legislation through Parliament in time for Oct 31 exit).

Result: Major victory for Boris Johnson; Britain remains on course to leave the EU on Oct 31 if the Government can see off attempts by Labour and Remainers to pass wrecking amendments in the next two days.

2. (a) Yes, but no - the deal is off

MPs vote for the Withdrawal Agreement Bill but not for the Programme Motion, Prime Minister pulls the legislation.

Result: Boris Johnson demands an immediate...
description: There are now four possible outcomes stemming from tonight's votes.
